name: Edward GOODMAN, Appellant v. PA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Goodman v. PA Department of Corrections

parties: Edward GOODMAN, Appellant v. PA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
61 A.3d 189
Edward GOODMAN, Appellant v. PA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 22, 2013.
